data.oai_dc:dc: Canada, Beaty Biodiversity Museum, herbarium, vascular plants, University of British Columbia Herbarium, UBC, British Columbia, specimens, collection, Canadensys|Occurrence|Specimen

This dataset includes all digitized vascular plants in the UBC collection, encompassing approximately 68% of the collection.The UBC Herbarium has one of the world's largest collections of British Columbia vascular plants and is worldwide in scope. At present, the collection includes more than 235,000 accessioned specimens.|181,857 occurrences
